messages.subject: Re:Poop? Long-Newbie with a relatively clean slate
messages.msgSnippet: And it all sounds better than finding suprises with my bare feet in the house!! Cat = poop and hairballs... --aj ... than ... floral
messages.messageBody:
And it all sounds better than finding "suprises" with my bare feet in
the house!! Cat => poop and hairballs...

--aj
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, TreeGoddess
<treegoddess@c...> wrote:
>
> On Dec 9, 2004, at 9:34 PM, Angela S wrote:
>
> > [but shoveling 50 lbs of horse poop is preferable to picking up.
> > one stinky doggy doo.]
>
> OMG . . . so true. I'd sooner clean a paddock full of horse poo
than
> my backyard with one dog's droppings. Horse poo is down right
floral
> comparatively. LOL
>
> -Tracy-
>
> "Every moment spent in unhappiness is a moment of
> happiness lost." -- Leo Buscaglia

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re:Poop? Long-Newbie with a relatively clean slate
messages.msgSnippet: ... OMG . . . so true.  I d sooner clean a paddock full of horse poo than my backyard with one dog s droppings.  Horse poo is down right floral comparatively.
messages.messageBody:
On Dec 9, 2004, at 9:34 PM, Angela S wrote:

> [but shoveling 50 lbs of horse poop is preferable to picking up.
> one stinky doggy doo.]

OMG . . . so true. I'd sooner clean a paddock full of horse poo than
my backyard with one dog's droppings. Horse poo is down right floral
comparatively. LOL

-Tracy-

"Every moment spent in unhappiness is a moment of
happiness lost." -- Leo Buscaglia

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re:Poop? Long-Newbie with a relatively clean slate
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 09/12/2004 18:37:16 Pacific Standard Time, ... I agree 1000 percent!!!! My poor collie has stress gastritis today, and there is green
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 09/12/2004 18:37:16 Pacific Standard Time,
game-enthusiast@... writes:


> but shoveling 50 lbs of horse poop is preferable to picking up one
> stinky doggy doo.)
>
I agree 1000 percent!!!! My poor collie has stress gastritis today, and there
is green mucousy poop all over his pants. Yuk. I would rather scrape horse
poop off myself than touch the dog poop. Must be the vegetarian diet??
Nancy in BC

messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] Re:Poop? Long-Newbie with a relatively clean slate
messages.msgSnippet: I d be scared if I pooped that big too.  LOL!  (couldn t help but join in on the poopy talk.  Our family is infamous for it). I have a job shoveling horse poop
messages.messageBody:
I'd be scared if I pooped that big too. LOL! (couldn't help but join in on
the poopy talk. Our family is infamous for it).



I have a job shoveling horse poop daily at the barn where we board our
horse. (but shoveling 50 lbs of horse poop is preferable to picking up one
stinky doggy doo.)



Angela ~ Maine

game-enthusiast@...

----------------------------------

On a ride once, big old Roscoe had a big poop onthe trail,
and on the way back home, he was scared of it and wouldn't go past it!!! <G>




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re:Poop? Long-Newbie with a relatively clean slate
messages.msgSnippet: Hey, how about cleaning up after a couple of 1200 lb. Quarter horses? Now there is a big poop. On a ride once, big old Roscoe had a big poop onthe trail, and
messages.messageBody:
Hey, how about cleaning up after a couple of 1200 lb. Quarter horses? Now
there is a big poop. On a ride once, big old Roscoe had a big poop onthe trail,
and on the way back home, he was scared of it and wouldn't go past it!!! <G>
I don't join in much, but you got my attention with the poopy talk.
We love the Capt Underpants with Professor Pippy P. Poopypants,and we take
out that book regularly and look up our names.
My 3 yr. old daugter is named Booger Livertush. Lots of fun that.
Nancy in BC, with nothing better to do than talk about poop.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
